## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G15690](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G15690)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>BADC3, BLP2</u>
- **Gene Name:** biotin/lipoyl attachment domain containing 3, BCCP-Like Protein 2
- **Description:**   Single hybrid motif superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2093237
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
